name: Driver 2
description: Driver 2: Back on the Streets (named Driver 2: The Wheelman Is Back in North America) is the second installment of the Driver video game series. It was developed by Reflections Interactive and published by Infogrames. A port to the Game Boy Advance was released in 2002, being developed by Sennari Interactive and was released under Infogrames' Atari range of products.
